quote.nm: Guanze Medical Information Industry (Holding) Co., Ltd.
quote.summary: Guanze Medical Information Industry (Holding) Co Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in providing medical imaging film products and medical imaging cloud services. The Company, together with its subsidiaries, is mainly engaged in the sales of medical imaging films procured from international brands and medical imaging films under its own Guanze Huiyi brand to hospitals and healthcare institutions. The Company's provided medical imaging films type primarily include medical dry laser films, thermal films and medical printing films. The Companyâ€™s medical imaging cloud services mainly include digital medical imaging cloud storage platform, digital medical image platform; regional imaging diagrams platform and PACS system. The Company mainly conducts its businesses in the domestic market.
